subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Petra Kvitova beat Magdalena Rybarikova of Slovakia, 6-4, 6-2, to win the Connecticut Open, her second title in New Haven in three years.
snippet: Petra Kvitova beat Magdalena Rybarikova of Slovakia, 6-4, 6-2, to win the Connecticut Open, her second title in New Haven in three years.
